ADS122C04_ADC_PI.hpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*
2  This is a library written for the TI ADS122C04
3  24-Bit 4-Channel 2-kSPS Delta-Sigma ADC With I2C Interface
4 
5  Written by: Paul Clark (PaulZC)
6  Date: May 4th 2020
7 
8  Modified by: Robert Mitchell (refmitchell)
9  Date: 15/02/2022
10 
11  Reason for modification:
12  Native operation on RPi using Linux i2c headers
13  as opposed to Arduino exclusive Wire.h.
14 
15  Based on: https://github.com/sparkfun/SparkFun_ADS122C04_ADC_Arduino_Library
16 
17  Based on the TI datasheet:
18  https://www.ti.com/product/ADS122C04
19  https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/ads122c04.pdf
20 
21  The MIT License (MIT)
22  Copyright (c) 2020 SparkFun Electronics
23  Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and
24  associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction,
25  including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense,
26  and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to
27  do so, subject to the following conditions:
28 
29  The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial
30  portions of the Software.
31 
32  THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT
33  NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
34  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
35  WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE
36  SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.

39 #ifndef ADS122C04_PI_LIBRARY_H
40 #define ADS122C04_PI_LIBRARY_H
41 
42 #include <cstdint>
43 #include <string>
44 #include <chrono>
45 
46 
47 // Single Conversion Timeout (millis)
48 // The maximum time we will wait for DRDY to go valid for a single conversion
49 #define ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT 75
50 
51 // Define 2/3/4-Wire, Temperature and Raw modes
52 #define ADS122C04_4WIRE_MODE 0x0
53 #define ADS122C04_3WIRE_MODE 0x1
54 #define ADS122C04_2WIRE_MODE 0x2
55 #define ADS122C04_TEMPERATURE_MODE 0x3
56 #define ADS122C04_RAW_MODE 0x4
57 #define ADS122C04_4WIRE_HI_TEMP 0x5
58 #define ADS122C04_3WIRE_HI_TEMP 0x6
59 #define ADS122C04_2WIRE_HI_TEMP 0x7
60 #define ADS122C04_POL_OP_MODE 0x8 // Custom mode to configure for POL_OP usage
61 
62 // ADS122C04 Table 16 in Datasheet
63 #define ADS122C04_RESET_CMD 0x06 //0000 011x Reset
64 #define ADS122C04_START_CMD 0x08 //0000 100x Start/Sync
65 #define ADS122C04_POWERDOWN_CMD 0x02 //0000 001x PowerDown
66 #define ADS122C04_RDATA_CMD 0x10 //0001 xxxx RDATA
67 #define ADS122C04_RREG_CMD 0x20 //0010 rrxx Read REG rr= register address 00 to 11
68 #define ADS122C04_WREG_CMD 0x40 //0100 rrxx Write REG rr= register address 00 to 11
69 
70 #define ADS122C04_WRITE_CMD(reg) (ADS122C04_WREG_CMD | (reg << 2)) //Shift is 2-bit in ADS122C04
71 #define ADS122C04_READ_CMD(reg) (ADS122C04_RREG_CMD | (reg << 2)) //Shift is 2-bit in ADS122C04
72 
73 // ADS122C04 Table 16 in Datasheet
74 #define ADS122C04_CONFIG_0_REG 0 // Configuration Register 0
75 #define ADS122C04_CONFIG_1_REG 1 // Configuration Register 1
76 #define ADS122C04_CONFIG_2_REG 2 // Configuration Register 2
77 #define ADS122C04_CONFIG_3_REG 3 // Configuration Register 3
78 
79 // Unshifted register definitions
80 // The bit field register definitions will do the bit shifting
81 
82 // Configuration Register 0
83 // ADS122C04 Table 19 in Datasheet
84 
85 // Input Multiplexer Configuration
86 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN1 0x0
87 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN2 0x1
88 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN3 0x2
89 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0 0x3
90 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN2 0x4
91 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN3 0x5
92 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3 0x6
93 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN3_AIN2 0x7
94 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AVSS 0x8
95 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AVSS 0x9
96 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AVSS 0xa
97 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AIN3_AVSS 0xb
98 #define ADS122C04_MUX_REFPmREFN 0xc
99 #define ADS122C04_MUX_AVDDmAVSS 0xd
100 #define ADS122C04_MUX_SHORTED 0xe
101 
102 // Gain Configuration
103 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_1 0x0
104 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_2 0x1
105 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_4 0x2
106 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_8 0x3
107 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_16 0x4
108 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_32 0x5
109 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_64 0x6
110 #define ADS122C04_GAIN_128 0x7
111 
112 // PGA Bypass (PGA is disabled when the PGA_BYPASS bit is set)
113 #define ADS122C04_PGA_DISABLED 0x1
114 #define ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED 0x0
115 
116 // Configuration Register 1
117 // ADS122C04 Table 19 in Datasheet
118 
119 // Data Rate
120 // Turbo mode = Normal mode * 2 (Samples per Second)
121 // Normal mode
122 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS 0x0
123 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_45SPS 0x1
124 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_90SPS 0x2
125 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_175SPS 0x3
126 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_330SPS 0x4
127 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_600SPS 0x5
128 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_1000SPS 0x6
129 
130 // Operating Mode
131 #define ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL 0x0
132 #define ADS122C04_OP_MODE_TURBO 0x1
133 
134 // Conversion Mode
135 #define ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT 0x0
136 #define ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_CONTINUOUS 0x1
137 
138 // Voltage Reference Selection
139 #define ADS122C04_VREF_INTERNAL 0x0 //2.048V internal
140 #define ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS 0x1 //REFp and REFn external
141 #define ADS122C04_VREF_AVDD 0x2 //Analog Supply AVDD and AVSS
142 
143 // Temperature Sensor Mode
144 #define ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF 0x0
145 #define ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_ON 0x1
146 
147 // Configuration Register 2
148 // ADS122C04 Table 22 in Datasheet
149 
150 // Conversion Result Ready Flag (READ ONLY)
151 
152 // Data Counter Enable
153 #define ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE 0x0
154 #define ADS122C04_DCNT_ENABLE 0x1
155 
156 // Data Integrity Check Enable
157 #define ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED 0x0
158 #define ADS122C04_CRC_INVERTED 0x1
159 #define ADS122C04_CRC_CRC16_ENABLED 0x2
160 
161 // Burn-Out Current Source
162 #define ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF 0x0
163 #define ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_ON 0x1
164 
165 // IDAC Current Setting
166 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_OFF 0x0
167 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_10_UA 0x1
168 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_50_UA 0x2
169 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_100_UA 0x3
170 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_250_UA 0x4
171 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_500_UA 0x5
172 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1000_UA 0x6
173 #define ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1500_UA 0x7
174 
175 // Configuration Register 3
176 // ADS122C04 Table 23 in Datasheet
177 
178 // IDAC1 Routing Configuration
179 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_DISABLED 0x0
180 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN0 0x1
181 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN1 0x2
182 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN2 0x3
183 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN3 0x4
184 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_REFP 0x5
185 #define ADS122C04_IDAC1_REFN 0x6
186 
187 // IDAC2 Routing Configuration
188 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED 0x0
189 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN0 0x1
190 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN1 0x2
191 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN2 0x3
192 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN3 0x4
193 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_REFP 0x5
194 #define ADS122C04_IDAC2_REFN 0x6
195 
196 // Bit field type register configuration
197 // Configuration Map register ADS122C04
198 //--------------Address 0x00---------------------------------
199 struct CONFIG_REG_0{
200  uint8_t PGA_BYPASS:1; // 0
201  uint8_t GAIN:3; // 1-3
202  uint8_t MUX:4; // 4-7
203 };
204 union CONFIG_REG_0_U {
205  uint8_t all;
206  struct CONFIG_REG_0 bit;
207 };
208 
209 //--------------Address 0x01---------------------------------
210 struct CONFIG_REG_1{
211  uint8_t TS:1; // 0
212  uint8_t VREF:2; // 1-2
213  uint8_t CMBIT:1; // 3
214  uint8_t MODE:1; // 4
215  uint8_t DR:3; // 5-7
216 };
217 
218 union CONFIG_REG_1_U {
219  uint8_t all;
220  struct CONFIG_REG_1 bit;
221 };
222 
223 //--------------Address 0x02---------------------------------
224 struct CONFIG_REG_2{
225  uint8_t IDAC:3; // 0-2
226  uint8_t BCS:1; // 3
227  uint8_t CRC:2; // 4-5
228  uint8_t DCNT:1; // 6
229  uint8_t DRDY:1; // 7
230 };
231 
232 union CONFIG_REG_2_U {
233  uint8_t all;
234  struct CONFIG_REG_2 bit;
235 };
236 
237 //--------------Address 0x03---------------------------------
238 struct CONFIG_REG_3{
239  uint8_t RESERVED:2; // 0-1
240  uint8_t I2MUX:3; // 2-4
241  uint8_t I1MUX:3; // 5-7
242 };
243 
244 union CONFIG_REG_3_U {
245  uint8_t all;
246  struct CONFIG_REG_3 bit;
247 };
248 
249 // All four registers
250 typedef struct ADS122C04Reg{
251  union CONFIG_REG_0_U reg0;
252  union CONFIG_REG_1_U reg1;
253  union CONFIG_REG_2_U reg2;
254  union CONFIG_REG_3_U reg3;
255 } ADS122C04Reg_t;
256 
257 // Union for the 14-bit internal Temperature
258 // To simplify converting from uint16_t to int16_t
259 // without using a cast
260 union internal_temperature_union{
261  int16_t INT16;
262  uint16_t UINT16;
263 };
264 
265 // Union for the 24-bit raw voltage
266 // To simplify converting from uint32_t to int32_t
267 // without using a cast
268 union raw_voltage_union{
269  int32_t INT32;
270  uint32_t UINT32;
271 };
272 
273 // struct to hold the initialisation parameters
274 typedef struct{
275  uint8_t inputMux;
276  uint8_t gainLevel;
277  uint8_t pgaBypass;
278  uint8_t dataRate;
279  uint8_t opMode;
280  uint8_t convMode;
281  uint8_t selectVref;
282  uint8_t tempSensorEn;
283  uint8_t dataCounterEn;
284  uint8_t dataCRCen;
285  uint8_t burnOutEn;
286  uint8_t idacCurrent;
287  uint8_t routeIDAC1;
288  uint8_t routeIDAC2;
289 } ADS122C04_initParam;
290 
291 // Designed to replace calls to Arduino millis()
292 inline unsigned long _millis(){
293  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
294  return std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time.time_since_epoch()).count();
295 }
296 
297 class SFE_ADS122C04
298 {
299 public:
300  SFE_ADS122C04(void);
301 
302  //By default use the default I2C address, and use Wire port
303  //Returns true if module is detected
304  bool begin(uint8_t deviceAddress = 0x45, std::string bus = "/dev/i2c-1");
305 
306  void enableDebugging(); // enable debug messages
307  void disableDebugging(); // disable debug messages
308 
309  float readPT100Centigrade(void); // Read the PT100 temperature in Centigrade
310  float readPT100Fahrenheit(void); // Read the PT100 temperature in Fahrenheit
311 
312  // Read the raw signed 24-bit ADC value as int32_t
313  // This uses the internal 2.048V reference with the gain set to 1
314  // The LSB is 2.048 / 2^23 = 0.24414 uV (0.24414 microvolts)
315  int32_t readRawVoltage(uint8_t rate = ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS);
316 
317  // Read the raw signed 24-bit ADC value as uint32_t
318  // The ADC data is returned in the least-significant 24-bits
319  uint32_t readADC(void);
320 
321  // Read the internal temperature (C)
322  float readInternalTemperature(uint8_t rate = ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS);
323 
324  bool reset(void); // Reset the ADS122C04
325  bool start(void); // Start a conversion
326  bool powerdown(void); // Put the chip into low power mode
327 
328  // Default to using 'safe' settings (disable the IDAC current sources)
329  // Configure the chip for the chosen mode
330  bool configureADCmode(uint8_t wire_mode = ADS122C04_RAW_MODE,
331  uint8_t rate = ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS);
332 
333  // Default to using 'safe' settings (disable the IDAC current sources)
334 
335  // Configure the input multiplexer
336  bool setInputMultiplexer(uint8_t mux_config = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
337 
338  // Configure the gain
339  bool setGain(uint8_t gain_config = ADS122C04_GAIN_1);
340 
341  // Enable/disable the Programmable Gain Amplifier
342  bool enablePGA(uint8_t enable = ADS122C04_PGA_DISABLED);
343 
344  // Set the data rate (sample speed)
345  bool setDataRate(uint8_t rate = ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS);
346  bool setOperatingMode(uint8_t mode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL); // Configure the operating mode (normal / turbo)
347  bool setConversionMode(uint8_t mode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT); // Configure the conversion mode (single-shot / continuous)
348  bool setVoltageReference(uint8_t ref = ADS122C04_VREF_INTERNAL); // Configure the voltage reference
349  bool enableInternalTempSensor(uint8_t enable = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF); // Enable / disable the internal temperature sensor
350  bool setDataCounter(uint8_t enable = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE); // Enable / disable the conversion data counter
351  bool setDataIntegrityCheck(uint8_t setting = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED); // Configure the data integrity check
352  bool setBurnOutCurrent(uint8_t enable = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF); // Enable / disable the 10uA burn-out current source
353  bool setIDACcurrent(uint8_t current = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_OFF); // Configure the internal programmable current sources
354  bool setIDAC1mux(uint8_t setting = ADS122C04_IDAC1_DISABLED); // Configure the IDAC1 routing
355  bool setIDAC2mux(uint8_t setting = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED); // Configure the IDAC2 routing
356 
357  bool checkDataReady(void); // Check the status of the DRDY bit in Config Register 2
358 
359  uint8_t getInputMultiplexer(void); // Get the input multiplexer configuration
360  uint8_t getGain(void); // Get the gain setting
361  uint8_t getPGAstatus(void); // Get the Programmable Gain Amplifier status
362  uint8_t getDataRate(void); // Get the data rate (sample speed)
363  uint8_t getOperatingMode(void); // Get the operating mode (normal / turbo)
364  uint8_t getConversionMode(void); // Get the conversion mode (single-shot / continuous)
365  uint8_t getVoltageReference(void); // Get the voltage reference configuration
366  uint8_t getInternalTempSensorStatus(void); // Get the internal temperature sensor status
367  uint8_t getDataCounter(void); // Get the data counter status
368  uint8_t getDataIntegrityCheck(void); // Get the data integrity check configuration
369  uint8_t getBurnOutCurrent(void); // Get the burn-out current status
370  uint8_t getIDACcurrent(void); // Get the IDAC setting
371  uint8_t getIDAC1mux(void); // Get the IDAC1 mux configuration
372  uint8_t getIDAC2mux(void); // Get the IDAC2 mux configuration
373 
374  // Print the ADS122C04 configuration (but only if enableDebugging has been called)
375  void printADS122C04config(void);
376 
377  // Requested in #5
378  uint8_t getDeviceAddress(void) { return (_deviceAddress); }
379  uint8_t getWireMode(void) { return (_wireMode); }
380 
381  // Manual config overrides
382  // Usage:
383  // - Initialise using generic initialisation
384  // - Get initParam struct pointer
385  // - Update desired options
386  // - Reinitialise device (using updated initParam).
387  ADS122C04_initParam* getCurrentInitParams(void);
388  bool reinitialise(void);
389 
390 private:
391  //Variables
392  int _i2c_fd; //The generic connection to user's chosen I2C hardware
393  uint8_t _deviceAddress; //Keeps track of I2C address. setI2CAddress changes this.
394 
395  bool _printDebug = false; //Flag to print debugging variables
396 
397  // Keep a copy of the wire mode so we can restore it after reading the internal temperature
398  uint8_t _wireMode = ADS122C04_4WIRE_MODE;
399 
400  // Resistance of the reference resistor
401  const float PT100_REFERENCE_RESISTOR = 1620.0;
402 
403  // Amplifier gain setting
404  // ** MAKE SURE THE CONFIG REGISTER 0 GAIN IS THE SAME AS THIS **
405  const float PT100_AMPLIFIER_GAIN = 8.0;
406  const float PT100_AMP_GAIN_HI_TEMP = 4.0;
407 
408  // Internal temperature sensor resolution
409  // One 14-bit LSB equals 0.03125C
410  const float TEMPERATURE_SENSOR_RESOLUTION = 0.03125;
411 
412  ADS122C04_initParam lastInitParams; // Retain the last initParam struct.
413  ADS122C04Reg_t ADS122C04_Reg; // Global to hold copies of all four configuration registers
414 
415  void debugPrint(char *message); // print a debug message
416  void debugPrintln(char *message); // print a debug message with line feed
417 
418  bool ADS122C04_init(ADS122C04_initParam *param); // initialise the ADS122C04 with these parameters
419 
420  bool ADS122C04_writeReg(uint8_t reg, uint8_t writeValue); // write a value to the selected register
421  bool ADS122C04_readReg(uint8_t reg, uint8_t *readValue); // read a value from the selected register (returned in readValue)
422 
423  bool ADS122C04_getConversionData(uint32_t *conversionData); // read the raw 24-bit conversion result
424  bool ADS122C04_getConversionDataWithCount(uint32_t *conversionData, uint8_t *count); // read the raw conversion result and count (if enabled)
425 
426  bool ADS122C04_sendCommand(uint8_t command); // write to the selected command register
427  bool ADS122C04_sendCommandWithValue(uint8_t command, uint8_t value); // write a value to the selected command register
428 };
429 #endif
